articles.author: Andre Janse Van Vuuren, Henry Ren
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Climb After Rally on Wall Street: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: US equities were set to retreat from record highs while European stocks declined for the first time this week as US President Donald Trump escalated his trade offensive.
articles.content:
US equities were set to retreat from record highs while European stocks declined for the first time this week as US President Donald Trump escalated his trade offensive.
